item.title: GoToMeeting Really is Like Being There
item.description:
GoToMeeting is advertised as a business tool that can take the place of in-person presentations. The idea itself is appealing: consider the expenses of travel combined with the value of time spent commuting to and from the meeting location, multiplied by the number of attendees. The cost of even a small meeting can be surprisingly high. When you realize the actual cost, it becomes hard to justify having in-person business meetings unless absolutely necessary, especially when an electronic alternative exists that can eliminate the inefficiencies and leave you with only the cost of the meeting content...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/gotomeeting-really-is-like-being-there/
